author: Ted Byrne
content:
Publishing advice... It is important to have something to say. A set of sure fire tools that will provide anyone with a voice are economics 101/102 and the same intro to accounting courses. They will allow massive insight into critical areas of investigation regardless of your politics/ideology/personal philosophy. Double entry bookkeeping is the pyramids of this civilization. And yet, to most people they are invisible.

Until you have something to say, it does not matter that you can say something in many languages.
